content: In an eight-point area, in the upper left corner of the board, White had five dead stones, meaning they could not avoid capture and were therefore prisoners.
translations: ita:In un'area di otto punti, nell'angolo in alto a sinistra del tavolo, il Bianco aveva cinque pietre morte, il che signifi
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
